name: Water and Robots (Don't Mix)
description:
Escape from rising water in this super short game.  Wanted to do something with water, couldn't get my original idea working so this is what I was able to do with the remaining time.

Controls:

Move - A/D

Interact - E

Credits:

Music - Absolutely Free Music (Unity Store)

Textures/Materials - Futuristic Panel Textures Lite (Unity Store)
